<Text>The Linguists
1:
--------------------
Text: The Linguists:  It follows two linguists, Greg Anderson of the Living Tongues Institute for Endangered Languages and David Harrison of Swarthmore College, as they travel around the world to collect recordings of some of the last speakers of several moribund (dying) languages: Chulym in Siberia; Chemehuevi in Arizona, U.S.; Sora in Orissa, India; and Kallawaya in Bolivia.
Triplets:<Greg Anderson
Living Tongues Institute for Endangered Languages
